org.apache.paimon.format.parquet

Class ParquetSchemaConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.format.parquet.ParquetSchemaConverter

  • public class ParquetSchemaConverter
extends Object
    Schema converter converts Parquet schema to and from Paimon internal types.
